Title....: Fist of Fury: The Sequel
IMDb......: http://imdblight.com/id/a0USM3liBE1ifXQE-Fist_of_Fury_The_Sequel
Genres...: Action, Drama
Year.....: 2001
Rating...: 6.5/10 with 12 ratings
Filmed in: Hong Kong
Language.: Cantonese

In this movie Bruce Lee is a student and because of the death of his master, he wants to 
take revenge for his master!!Very good movie from the grandmaster in martial arts Bruce 
Lee.For more information go to http://www.wing-chun.ws/Fist%20of%20Fury.html
